name: Flying Iron Robot City Rescue
description:
Become a super Iron hero in this action packed 3D infinity battleground game. Join this 2018 survival war in the exciting sequel of infinity war. Each mission bursting with exciting challenges & you need to go through wisely from all tasks to compete with the gangster mafia. Fight with city criminals to protect civilian’s life.

Your enemies use different fighting styles so do your best to overcome them in style! Level up your fighting skills with each level! Fight against powerful rivals, win over them, earn points and buy new belts to unlock new levels of your progression!
